title: use absolute in CSS
content: CSS absolute use exampleleft:0right:0        --------> stretch and cover the relative parenttop:0bottom:0

title: 前缀和问题
content: 方法一nums[i] = pre[i] - pre[i-1]let pre[-1] = 0 then i = 0 时 等式依然成立但是该方法的pre定义使解题过程繁复而且要处理边界问题方法二限定pre[0] = 0pre[i] = nums[0]+nums[1]+…+nums[i-1]nums[i]+…nums[j] = pre[j+1] - pre[i]所以最后一位 pre[n] = nums[0]+…+nums[n-1]// An highlighted blockvar pre
